languages.text: {n}Инквизитор снимает с пальца перстень и протягивает вам. На нем начертан замысловатый личный герб.{/n} "Примите этот подарок в знак моего расположения. В трудный час отдайте его любому верному слуге Императора, и Инквизиция придет на помощь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Инквизитор снимает с пальца перстень и протягивает вам. На нем начертана замысловатый личный герб.{/n} "Примите этот подарок в знак моего расположения. В трудный час отдайте его любому верному слуге Императора, и Инквизиция придет на помощь".

languages.text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."
languages.original_text: {n}Инквизитор снимает с пальца перстень и протягивает вам. На нем начертан замысловатый личный герб.{/n} "Примите этот подарок в знак моего расположения. В трудный час отдайте его любому верному слуге Императора, и Инквизиция придет на помощь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Xavier removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. There is an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my good graces. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

{n}Xavier removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. There is an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my good graces. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

{n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

{n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

{n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルが自分の指から印章指輪を外して差し出す。指輪には複雑な紋章が刻まれている。{/n}「好意の印として、この贈り物を受け取ってもらいたい。助力が必要ならば、皇帝の忠実な部下にその指輪を渡すとよい。異端審問庁が助けとなろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルが自分の指から印章指輪を外して差し出す。指輪には複雑な紋章が刻まれている。{/n}「好意の印として、この贈り物を受け取ってもらいたい。助力が必要ならば、皇帝の忠実な部下にその指輪を渡すとよい。異端審問庁が助けとなろう」

languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

languages.text: {n}卡尔卡扎从手指上褪下一枚图章戒指，交给了你。你注意到，戒指上刻着繁复的私人印记。{/n}“请收下这件礼物，作为我对你的青睐。如果你遇到什么麻烦，只要把它交给帝皇的任意一位忠仆，审判庭必将前来相助。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡尔卡扎从手指上褪下一枚图章戒指，交给了你。你注意到，戒指上刻着繁复的私人印记。{/n}“请收下这件礼物，作为我对你的青睐。如果你遇到什么麻烦，只要把它交给帝皇的任意一位忠仆，审判庭必将前来相助。”

languages.text: {n}Calcazar se quita un anillo de sello del dedo y te lo entrega. Notas que tiene grabado un complejo escudo heráldico.{/n} «Acepte este anillo como signo de mi favor. En momentos de necesidad, déselo a cualquier sirviente fiel del Emperador y la Inquisición acudirá en su ayuda».
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar se quita un anillo de sello del dedo y te lo entrega. Notas que tiene grabado un complejo escudo heráldico.{/n} «Acepte este anillo como signo de mi favor. En momentos de necesidad, déselo a cualquier sirviente fiel del Emperador y la Inquisición acudirá en su ayuda».

languages.text: {n}Calcazar retire une chevalière enfilée à son doigt et vous la tend. Vous remarquez qu'elle est gravée de ses armoiries personnelles.{/n} « Veuillez accepter ceci en gage de ma faveur. Quand vous vous retrouverez dans une situation délicate, montrez-la à n'importe quel fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur, et l'Inquisition viendra à votre secours. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar retire une chevalière enfilée à son doigt et vous la tend. Vous remarquez qu'elle est gravée de ses armoiries personnelles.{/n} « Veuillez accepter ceci en gage de ma faveur. Quand vous vous retrouverez dans une situation délicate, montrez-la à n'importe quel fidèle serviteur de l'Empereur, et l'Inquisition viendra à votre secours. »

languages.text: {n}Calcazar zieht sich einen Siegelring vom Finger und überreicht ihn dir. Du bemerkst darauf ein fein gefertigtes persönliches Wappen.{/n} "Bitte nehmt dieses Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Gunst entgegen. Gebt es in einer Stunde der Not einem beliebigen treuen Diener des Imperators, und die Inquisition wird Euch zu Hilfe eilen."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calcazar zieht sich einen Siegelring vom Finger und überreicht ihn dir. Du bemerkst darauf ein fein gefertigtes persönliches Wappen.{/n} "Bitte nehmt dieses Geschenk als Zeichen meiner Gunst entgegen. Gebt es in einer Stunde der Not einem beliebigen treuen Diener des Imperators, und die Inquisition wird Euch zu Hilfe eilen."

languages.text: {n}Calcazar, parmağındaki mühür yüzüklerinin birini çıkarıp sana veriyor. Üzerinde detaylı, şahsi bir arma olduğunu fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Lütfen bunu iyi niyetimin bir göstergesi olarak kabul et. İhtiyaç anında bunu İmparatorluk'un herhangi bir inançlı hizmetkârına ver. Engizisyon yardımına gelecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Calcazar removes a signet ring from his finger and hands it to you. You notice an intricate personal coat of arms on it.{/n} "Please accept this gift as a sign of my favour. In an hour of need, give it to any faithful servant of the Emperor, and the Inquisition will come to your aid."
